column4: N Locust Hill Dr near Richmond SRD
column5: One lane possibly blocked.  Two tow trucks enroute.

column4: Russell Cave Rd near Hughes Ln
column5: One lane is blocked until further notice due to a damaged electrical pole from an earlier collision.

column4: The NWS has issued a winter weather advisory in effect from November 30 at 4 p.m. to December 1 at 7 a.m.
Use added caution, slow down, and increase following distances.
